title: New Moon Reiki Sound Healing Ceremony — Awaken with Darren
description: Join Darren for a special new moon reiki sound healing ceremony with cacao at Pura Luna in Santa Barbara.
cleaned_text: Join reiki master and sound healer Darren Marc Levene for a transformative evening of reiki, meditation, and sacred sound. During this new moon celebration, Darren will offer 1:1 reiki, guided meditation, and sound healing to help you connect to your inner-most being where peace, happiness, and joy reside. To help open our hearts, we will also share in a cacao ceremony and sing healing medicine songs. In this sacred space of the heart, your intentions will be blessed and amplified by the new moon energy.
